about-me.title: About me
about-me.content: I'm a frontend developer passionate about creating modern and responsive interfaces. I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and I'm always looking to improve my skills, exploring new technologies and development best practices. I have experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Tailwind, among other technologies. I'm currently studying SQL and Node.js. My focus is to provide the best user experience through well-structured designs and clean code. I'm always open to new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer!

project-1.title: E-commerce
project-1.description: Project focused on studying React.js and Tailwind CSS. The project simulates an e-commerce with basic functionalities such as adding products to the cart, removing products from the cart, and calculating the total purchase amount.

project-2.title: Portfolio
project-2.description: My personal portfolio, developed with React.js and Tailwind CSS. The project aims to present my projects and skills as a frontend developer.
